casebody.data:
NEILL GRADING
v.
LINGAFELT. No. 112PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 20, 2005. Mark J. Prak, Charles E. Coble, Raleigh, Mack Sperling, Greensboro, for Lingafelt, et al. Stephen M. Thomas, Michael J. Barnett, Hickory, for Neill Grading & Construction.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of October 2005 by NC Asso. of Broadcasters, et al. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of October 2005."
